subject: Approval of BOT (Toll) bids for award of works
text: IR7v <ev <TTHTf mfearrut 7414 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (3& Wdr7 3k THTI HAT44) 47M9 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 7-5 W 6, {er-10, Era , T$ Rcri-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10_ Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No. 1104 /218/2007-Admn Date: 19.09.201 6 PolicY Matter_ Iechnical (216/2016) [Decision iaken by Executive Committee vide circulation and approved on 04.09.2016] Sub:-Approval of BOT (Toll) bids for award of works: Vide Policy Circular (46/2010) dated 22.01,2010, the procedure for acceptance of bid of PPPIBOT (Toll) projects were outlined. The aforesaid procedures do not specify the procedure of approval of bids with quoted premium: 2 In this regard, it is clarified that in cases, where no VGF is involved and the response to the bid is adequate (i.e. more than two valid bids) , the evaluation of bids for award purpose will be approved by Chairman, NHAL 3 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. (A.K Sadhu) CGM (Coord:) To: All Officers & Employees of HQ/ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices HvrM NHAL
